name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Zurich Airport
address: PO Box 295, Zurich-Airport, Kloten, Zurich, 8058 Zurich, Zurich
description: Radisson Blu Hotel Zurich Airport provides 4-star accommodation in Kloten, just minutes from Zurich Airport. It is set amongst a range of popular eateries and is minutes on foot from Zurich Airport Railway Station. This modern hotel offers an on-site fitness centre, an executive floor and an express check-in and check-out feature. Guests can also enjoy on-site parking. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with cable/satellite channels, tea and coffee making facilities and converters/voltage adaptors. They provide movies-on-demand, a seating area and a private bathroom. Guests of Radisson Blu Hotel in Zurich can sit down to a satisfying breakfast each morning at Filini Restaurant, as well as dinner at Angels' Wine Tower Grill in the evening. Radisson Blu Zurich Airport has disabled parking and is within easy driving distance of Oerlikon and ETH Zurich. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Kloten Balsberg Railway Station, which allows convenient access in and around Kloten.Revato

name: Hotel Schweizerhof Zürich
description: The Hotel Schweizerhof Zürich is located opposite the main station at the beginning of the Bahnhofstrasse and offers soundproofed rooms with electrically adjustable beds and free high-speed WiFi. The Schweizerhof's French restaurant 'La Soupière' offers you delicious seasonal cuisine and Swiss specialities made of market-fresh ingredients. The Café Gourmet and its caviar boutique serves fine antipasti, salads, pastry and much more. The Schweizerhof Bar is famous for its wide selection of whiskies and local and international beers. You enjoy free access to the close by Holmes Place Fitness & Spa. The Schweizerhof Zürich hotel is only a 15-minute walk away from Lake Zurich and only a 10-minute train ride from the international airport Zurich-Kloten.

name: Swiss Night by Fassbind
description: Opened at the end of 2016, the Swiss Night by Fassbind is situated in a quiet location in the city centre and features rooms decorated in an individual Swiss style. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Each of the spacious rooms is fitted with a comfortable new bed, a desk, a minibar, a safe, coffee and tea making facilities, an iron and ironing board, a flat-screen TV, and a bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. A business corner with a printer is available in the lobby and a fitness room is offered for guests. Swiss Night by Fassbind also offers a 24-hour reception desk. All sights and attractions including the Bahnhofstrasse, Lake Zurich, the University Hospital and the banking district are easily reachable on foot. The next public transport stop, Kunsthaus, is only 150 metres away. The airport can be reached within 15 minutes by public transport from Bahnhof Stadelhofen and the main station is only 1 stop from there.

name: Renaissance Zurich Tower Hotel
description: The Renaissance Zurich Tower Hotel is located in the heart of Zurich West. Part of Zurich District 5 and loosely bordered by Hardbrucke station and the shops at Im Viadukt Zurich West is an urban adventure waiting to happen. Our spacious hotel rooms and suites are comfortably equipped with free Wifi and each offers panoramic views over the district and the city. The Sky Lounge with complimentary food and beverages and the fitness, sauna and steam bath area complete the perfect stay in Zurich. Enjoy tasty dishes at the EQUINOX Restaurant, sit back and relax in our LUCID Bar and Lounge and savor a cocktail, drink or snack, or treat yourself to some fine dining in our Atelier V restaurant. If you have something extraordinary to celebrate we recommend the Upperdeck one of Zurich's highest and most exclusive event locations located on the 15th floor overlooking the Zurich skyline.Marriott

name: Züri by Fassbind
description: Opened in 2017, the Züri by Fassbind offers modern rooms designed by the famous architects Gigon & Guyer, 50 metres from Escher Wyss Platz and a 6-minute tram ride from Zurich main station and the Bahnhofstrasse. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. All rooms are equipped with large soundproof windows, air conditioning, a desk, a minibar, a safe, coffee and tea making facilities, an iron and ironing board, a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A fitness room and a sauna can be used free of charge by hotel guests and a business corner with a printer is featured in the lobby. Garage parking is available at a surcharge. Various trams and buses stop near the hotel and the airport is a 10-minute train ride from the nearby Hardbrücke train station. The motorway is 2 km from Züri by Fassbind.

name: Hyatt Place Zurich Airport The Circle
description: Hyatt Place Zurich Airport the Circle has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Kloten. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The property is allergy-free and is situated 6.2 km from Zurich Exhibition Hall. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms have a wardrobe. The daily breakfast offers American, vegetarian or gluten-free options. A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at Hyatt Place Zurich Airport the Circle. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English, Spanish and French. ETH Zurich is 10 km from the accommodation, while Swiss National Museum is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Zurich Airport, a few steps from Hyatt Place Zurich Airport the Circle.

name: Zurich Marriott Hotel
description: With stunning lake views, brilliant decor and exceptional service, Zurich Marriott Hotel invites you to experience Switzerland in style. Nestled downtown along the banks of the Limmat River, our riverside hotel offers access to iconic attractions. Stroll through the cobblestone streets of Old Town and admire medieval architecture on your way to upscale shopping at Bahnhofstrasse or swimming at Lake Zurich. After a day of sightseeing, sample the flavors of Switzerland or savor Thai dishes at our restaurants. Unwind at our New York-inspired bar featuring rare whiskies and smoker's lounge with premium cigars before retiring to your room with contemporary decor, pillowtop beds, free high-speed Wi-Fi and TVs. Our hotel is pet friendly. Upgrade to one of our suites to enjoy more space and access to our M Club Lounge. Host your next meeting or event at our conference hotel. We have plenty of parking available, floor-to-ceiling windows, custom catering menus and modern equipment in our 12 event venues.Marriott

name: Holiday Inn Zurich Messe
description: A business-friendly hotel opposite Messe Zürich convention centre with easy Zurich Airport access Holiday Inn® Zürich Messe hotel is a 10-minute walk from Zurich Oerlikon station, from where a 10-minute train ride takes you to Zürich Hauptbahnhof train station in the city centre, and a five-minute ride takes you to Zurich Airport. You can also reach the airport in 10 minutes by car. Facing the hotel, the Hallenstadion hosts international concerts and sports, or you can catch blockbuster shows at nearby Theater 11. You can browse designer boutiques at the expansive Glatt shopping mall, six minutes' drive away, or head to the city centre for even more retail options. The hotel's seven high-tech meeting rooms can host events for up to 250 delegates. There's free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour Business Centre and on-site parking is available for a daily fee. Business guests are handy for companies including Amcor and Credit Suisse, and on the doorstep of the Messe Zürich for major exhibitions. Contemporary guestrooms all feature parquet floors, while executive rooms offer extra space and amenities. Enjoy a full American hot breakfast buffet and later, traditional dishes with a contemporary twist at Bits & Bites brasserie. Workout in the 24-hour Mini-Gym, before relaxing with a cocktail or glass of wine in the Lobby Bar or out on the terrace.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Kameha Grand Zurich, Autograph Collection
description: Welcome to Kameha Grand Zurich. As a member of the Autograph Collection, a brand of the world's largest hotel chain Marriott, the Kameha Grand is a prime example of the credo of the Autograph Collection Hotels: "Exactly like nothing else". A lifestyle hotel for discerning business travelers and events with impressive architecture, festive and unpredictable decors, rounded off with numerous Swiss-inspired design elements. The 245 rooms and suites designed by Marcel Wanders integrate "Swissness" in an impressive manner. The Kameha Grand sets further accents with 11 themed suites that are individually furnished - from a gentleman's suite with roulette table to a workout suite with treadmill and dumbbells. Seven different sized banqueting rooms set the stage for memorable events. The heart of the hotel is the “Kameha Dome” which already impresses with its sheer size of over 700 sqm, ideal for large scale conferences, galas and social gatherings.Marriott

name: Mercure Zürich City
description: Aja Zuerich is a popular choice amongst travelers in Zurich, whether exploring or just passing through. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. To be found at the property are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, convenience store, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop, taxi service. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Zurich, aja Zuerich will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Sheraton Zurich Hotel
description: Sheraton Zurich Hotel is the new gathering place in Zurich. Experience Zurich as you have never experienced it before! Our 4 star hotel is the perfect starting point for a stroll through the area and its trendy shops and bars. Sheraton brings people together. Meet the young and cosmopolitan neighborhood in our bar NUOVO or at the Route 26 Steakhouse. Our modern hotel is located just a few minutes away from the city center and the central station. The tram station Toni-Areal is located directly in front of the hotel. Our cozy rooms and suites, some with impressive views over Zurich, are your place of rest and relaxation in the lively Zurich West district. Whether it is a seminar with an accompanying entertainment program, a small meeting or a private event, there are 8 light-flooded, flexible meeting rooms for up to 230 persons and ample parking space make your event shine at our business hotel. Also our kiosk in the lobby gives you the opportunity to buy a wide range of snacks and beverages 24-hours a day.Marriott

name: 25hours Hotel Zurich West
description: The 25hours Hotel Zurich West has a lively mixture of vibrant colors, authentic local flair and a homely atmosphere. It is very much in touch with its surroundings and combines work by the Zurich-based designer Alfredo Haeberli with creative art. Embodying the hotel company's tongue in cheek humor, the 25hours Hotel Zurich West never takes itself too seriously and shows what the city has to offer other than banking, chocolate and watches.accorhotels.com

name: 25hours Hotel Zurich Langstrasse
description: 25hours Hotel Langstrasse is located right next to Zurich's main station. Culture and lifestyle all converge on legendary Langstrasse. The designer, Werner Aisslinger, regards the hotel as a small, independent universe, inspired by the contrasts between banks and red lights, art and finance. Regularly changing artists work in and around the hotel, always ensuring new, creative input.accorhotels.com

name: Radisson Hotel Zurich Airport
description: Radisson Hotel Zurich Airport provides 4-star accommodation in Rumlang, just moments from Zurich Airport. The various facilities this trendy hotel offers include supervised child care/activities, a coffee bar and an express check-in and check-out feature. This modern hotel provides a currency exchange, luggage storage and a 24-hour reception. Guests can also enjoy on-site parking. Rooms have a modern décor, air-conditioning and converters/voltage adaptors. Hot drinks can be brewed with the complimentary tea and coffee supplies, and enjoyed in the comfort of the room's living area. In-house dining options include Bocca Buona Restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. Radisson Hotel Zurich Airport has disabled parking and is within easy driving distance of Oerlikon, ETH Zurich and Credit Suisse. Kloten and Glattbrugg are located an easy drive away.Revato

name: Hyatt Regency Zurich Airport Circle
description: Hyatt Regency Zurich Airport The Circle is located within the Circle at Zurich Airport, and comes with a restaurant and a bar featuring the Circle views and Swiss-inspired cocktails. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and fitness centre, a spa with sauna and relaxation area, room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. With Swiss design, rooms at the hotel are equipped with individually controlled air conditioning, a 65" flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee-making equipment. The bathroom includes a walk-in rain shower. Guests at Hyatt Regency Zurich Airport The Circle can enjoy a full American breakfast buffet at Restaurant Babel, which specialises in Middle Eastern cuisine. A concierge service and luggage storage space are available at the Hyatt Regency Zurich Airport Circle, which also has several terraces and a Regency Club Lounge with park views. Guests enjoy direct access to the adjacent park and The Circle Convention Centre with state-of-the-art meeting space. Zurich Exhibition Hall is 6 km from the hotel, while Zoo Zurich is 9 km away. The nearest airport is Zurich Airport, a few steps from Hyatt Regency Zurich Airport Circle.

name: Central Plaza Hotel
description: The Central Plaza Hotel is situated right at Zurich's Central Square next to the main railway station. Guests enjoy free WiFi and complimentary access to the gym next door. A coffee machine with free coffee can be found in all rooms and there are 2 restaurants. All rooms are soundproofed and they come with a minibar and satellite TV. The private bathrooms feature a hairdryer and toiletries. Slippers and bathrobes are offered on request. The Central Plaza features the Kings Cave grill restaurant, located in the cellar and decorated with ancient mirrors and paintings. The Central 1 restaurant and bar serves breakfast, lunch, coffee and cake as well as dinner. In the evening, there is live piano music. During summer, guests can also dine at the Central Garden outside. The Bahnhofstraße, Zurich's most popular shopping street, is only few steps away from the Central Plaza. In the close surroundings, there are also numerous banks, historical churches, several museums and art galleries.

name: Placid Hotel Zurich
description: Rooms Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 115 guestrooms, featuring heated floors and flat-screen televisions. Cable programming and tablet computers are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, as well as phones with free international calls. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour health club or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Zürich? This hotel has facilities measuring 2691 square feet (250 square meters), including conference space. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Placid Hotel Design & Lifestyle Zurich in Zürich (Zürich Center), you'll be a 2-minute drive from Letzigrund Stadium and 6 minutes from Bahnhofstrasse. This 4-star hotel is 2.8 mi (4.5 km) from Paradeplatz and 3.2 mi (5.1 km) from Swiss National Museum. Dining For lunch or dinner, stop by Restaurant Buckhuser, a bar/lounge that specializes in Regional cuisine. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Buffet breakfasts are served on weekends from 6:30 AM to 1:00 PM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: CHF 2.50 per person, per night We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately CHF 29 per person Airport shuttle fee: CHF 49 per person (one way) Covered self parking fee: CHF 25 per day Covered extended parking fee: CHF 25 per day Pet fee: CHF 15 per pet, per night Service animals are exempt from fees Early check-in is available for a fee (subject to availability) Late check-out is available for a fee (subject to availability) Crib (infant bed) fee: CHF 15.0 per night Hosted evening meal: CHF 25 The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at 7:00 AM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed Guests must contact this property in advance to reserve cribs/infant beds This property uses geothermal energy, plus a grey water recycling system and eco-friendly cleaning products Safety features at this property include a smoke detector Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel. This property offers transfers from the airport (surcharges may apply). To arrange pick-up, guests must contact the property on arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions No rollaway/extra beds available Essential workers only - NO Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Protective clothing is available to guests Masks are available to guests Gloves are available to guests Shield between guests and staff in main contact areas Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Contactless check-in is available Property follows regional sanitization guidelines Clean & Safe (Switzerland) Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Individually-wrapped food options are available Individually-wrapped food options are available for breakfast Individually-wrapped food options are available for lunch Individually-wrapped food options are available for dinner Individually-wrapped food options are available through room service Temperature checks are available to guests Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Contactless check-out is available Electrostatic spray is used for disinfection Cashless transactions are available Masks are compulsory at the property Contactless food service / room service is available Food service has been amended for enhanced safetyViajes Exito Hotels

name: Aparthotel Adagio Zurich Center
description: The 4-star Aparthotel Adagio Zurich City Center consists of 64 apartments of different sizes. Each serviced apartment has a fully equipped kitchen. Let yourself be pampered in our hotel restaurant. Another highlight: The in-house library invites you to relax. Meanwhile, the little guests can let off steam in our "Kid's Corner". Make yourself at home during your stay at the Adagio Zurich City Center.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel St.Gotthard
description: Located on the famous Bahnhofstrasse shopping street in the heart of Zurich, Hotel St. Gotthard offers air-conditioned rooms and 3 restaurants. The train station is only 100 metres away. Built in 1889 and family-run since then, the St. Gotthard was recently refurbished, modernised and enlarged. It offers free Wi-Fi throughout its 5 storeys. The spacious rooms at Hotel St. Gotthard all have a bathroom with a hairdryer, a flat-screen TV, and tea and coffee-making facilities. The famous Lobster and Oyster Bar was established in 1935. Ever since, it has been a culinary institution serving classic French cuisine. The Lobby Restaurant serves international cuisine and offers live piano music. The Piazzetta has a summer terrace overlooking the Bahnhofstrasse. The Manzoni is a stylish Italian bar. Many shops and restaurants are only steps away. Lake Zurich can be reached in a 10-minute walk from Hotel St. Gotthard.

name: ibis Styles Zurich City Center
description: Ibis Styles Zurich City Center is an affordable 3-star hotel just minutes from the main train station and Zurich's highlights. This design hotel featuring geometric elements and optical illusions by artist M.C. Escher has 202 rooms and 5 meeting rooms with modern equipment. Relax in the wellness area with sauna, enjoy a meal in the restaurant or immerse yourself in the hustle and bustle of the city.accorhotels.com

name: Five Zurich - Luxury City Resort
description: Dubbed the new dining and nightlife destination in Switzerland, FIVE Zurich is a luxurious lifestyle hotel boasting 87 luxurious suites and 62 contemporary hotel rooms with glittering skyline city view or lush forest view. Reviving Zurichs wild side, the new party and culinary hotspot boasts 7 international award-winning restaurants, a rooftop nightclub and buzzing outdoor social pool. Detox before you retox at the lavish wellness spa with indoor pool.The new FIVE hotel in Zurich will seamlessly unites the very best of Swiss hospitality with FIVEs characteristic flair for an exceptionally indulgent experience for guests from the city and international visitors alike. This stunning hotel overlooks the city center from Zurichs stunning Uetliberg plateau and is within a 10-minute drive to the city center and main attractions; and a 20-minute drive to Zurichs main airport. Direct access to public transport within a 2-minute walk.iHotelier/iStay

name: Crowne Plaza Zurich
description: A four-star hotel in trendy Zurich West with free Wi-Fi, meeting facilities and easy access to the city centre. Crowne Plaza Zurich hotel offers four-star accommodation in the trendy Zurich West district, with fast routes to the heart of the city. Stroll five minutes to the nearby tram stop and reach Zurich Old Town in 10 minutes, or walk 15 minutes to Hardbruecke train station. Drivers enjoy easy access to the A1, A2 and A3 motorways, as well as secure hotel parking, while Zurich Airport is only a 15-minute drive away. Start your day with a swim at Holmes Place Health Club, then head to central Zurich to explore historic Lindenhof, Grossmuenster Church and Bahnhofstrasse. Later, have a drink in our chic bar before attending a match at Letzigrund Stadium, only three minutes' walk from the hotel. Zurich West's lively nightlife scene and concerts at MAAG Halle are less than two kilometers away. Business travellers stay Completely Connected with fast Wi-Fi and a 24-hour Business Centre. Meet colleagues over a delicious meal in our restaurant. For larger events, 11 high-tech meeting rooms suit every sort of function, while our ballroom can host up to 450 people. Allow our dedicated Crowne Plaza Meeting Director to handle the details. When the day is done, sink into premium bedding, order fresh food with 24-hour room service, switch on the TV and relax.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Courtyard by Marriott Zurich North
description: Get to Zurich Kreis 11 from anywhere in the world by train, bus, car and more. The airport is just a few stops away. Occupying a first class location the hotel in Oerlikon is not only near the airport but only 7 minutes from Zurich downtown and just a 3 minute walk from Zurich Oerlikon Station. Many companies, Hallenstadion and the fairground are within walking distance. Combing innovative design and a fresh, contemporary style, the 152 spacious guest rooms feature plush bedding and black out curtains to ensure a great nights sleep and guaranteeing your day gets off to a flying start. Feeling active. Enjoy an energizing workout in the gym. Or if you prefer a more leisurely stay, then kick back and relax in the Kitchen and Bar with its current, seasonal and inviting all day food and beverage service.Marriott

name: Widder Hotel
description: In a tranquil location in Zurich’s Old Town, just 200 metres from the Bahnhofstrasse shopping street, this 5-star hotel occupies 9 adjacent, carefully renovated historic buildings decorated with works by famous artists. An award-winning gourmet restaurant and free WiFi are featured. Furniture and various objects by artists including Mies van der Rohe, Frank Lloyd Wright, Le Corbusier, and Adolf Loos can be admired in Hotel Widder, as well as paintings and sculptures by Andy Warhol, Robert Rauschenberg, and others. The Widder Hotel’s spacious, luxuriously furnished rooms are all individually decorated. They are air-conditioned and offer complimentary soft drinks, a modern video and audio entertainment system by B&O, and an elegant bathroom. Awarded 15 points by the Gault Millau guide, the Widder Restaurant serves Swiss and international gourmet cuisine. Traditional Swiss dishes are offered in the Zur Schtund restaurant, and in summer, guests can also dine in the courtyard. At the Widder Bar, guests can choose from a large selection of spirits from around the world and enjoy regular live jazz performances. Zurich's Main Train Station and the shore of Lake Zurich can both be reached in just a 10-minute walk.

name: Seedamm Plaza
description: Overlooking Lake Zürich, the Seedamm Plaza enjoys a unique location on the shores opposite of the historic city of Rapperswil. It features the Swiss Casino Pfäffikon, in-house restaurants as well as a gym and sauna facilities. Free WiFi is available in the entire building. All en-suite rooms are individually furnished and provide adjustable air-conditioning and a flat-screen satellite TV. Some also boast a terrace and king-size beds. Free mineral water is provided in each room. The restaurants of the Seedamm Plaza serve regional as well as international cuisine. Guests can also dine in the Mediterranean Restaurant Olea or the Kaori, serving sushi and other Japanese specialties. On sunny days, the terrace offers a beautiful view over Lake Zürich and the surrounding mountains. Guests of the Seedamm Plaza can relax in the hotel’s saunas and steam baths or get active in the fitness centre. The nearby St. Gallen and Glarner Alps and Lake Zürich are an ideal starting point for hiking or cycling. In winter, attractions including ski slopes and cross-country ski trails as well as toboggan runs are nearby. The hotel provides a charging station for electric cars (for a fee) and offers free private parking. The city of Zurich is reachable in 30 minutes by car or public transport.

name: Novotel Zurich City West
description: The Novotel Zurich City West is there for you and your family around the clock. Our bar-restaurant The Flave of Zurich serves breakfast and snacks 24 hours and our kitchen offers specialties from all over the world, including vegan dishes. Swim a few laps in the pool or explore Zurich right after your meeting. Prepare for your meetings in elegant Scandinavian-style rooms at comfortable desks.accorhotels.com

name: Baur au Lac
description: Uniquely situated in its own private park in the heart of Zurich with views over Lake Zurich and the Alps, the 5-star Baur au Lac offers elegant and luxurious rooms and suites with free minibar use. Guests benefit from an award-winning restaurant, free WiFi, and a top-floor fitness centre. 2 renowned restaurants, one with a terrace in the idyllic garden and an inviting bar, contribute to the fame of the Baur au Lac. The Restaurant Pavillon was awarded 2 Michelin star and 18 points by Gault Millau. Medical massages and physiotherapy are available on request, and there is a hair and beauty salon on site. Valet parking, a limousine service, maid service twice a day, and a concierge service around the clock are also offered at the Baur au Lac. You can also have your car repaired and washed in the hotel's garage, buy flowers, or browse through the offer of the wine boutique. The banking centre at the Parade Square and the famous Bahnhofstrasse shopping street are only a few minutes' walk away.

name: La Réserve Eden au Lac Zurich
description: With a stay at La Réserve Eden au Lac Zurich, you'll be centrally located in Zürich, within a 5-minute drive of Bahnhofstrasse and ETH Zurich. Featured amenities include express check-out, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Park Hyatt Zurich
description: This contemporary 5-star hotel is located in the heart of Zurich, yet just steps away from the fashionable Bahnhofstrasse shopping street, Lake Zurich and the Old Town. It has a health club with a gym, steam bath, sauna and treatment rooms. Park Hyatt Zurich displays avant-garde architecture, contemporary art and spacious accomodations within the elegant, glass-fronted exterior. You can admire chefs at work at the show kitchen of the ‘parkhuus’ Restaurant, which is set within floor-to-ceiling glass on 3 sides. A 2-storey wine library houses 3000 bottles of wine and has its own spiral staircase for access. The stylish ONYX bar has a variety of beverages to offer, while The Lounge features comfortable lounge chairs and sofas, as well as an open fireplace. Breakfast and light dining, afternoon high tea and freshly ground coffee are served. Stockerstrasse Tram Stop is just 100 metres away, while the Main Train Station is 1 km from the hotel. Zurich International Airport is at a distance of 10 km.

name: Acasa Suites
description: As a boutique apart hotel - ideally located between Zurich airport and the city - we offer you spacious hotel rooms, suites, and serviced apartments for your short or long stay in Zurich. Parking spaces and charging stations are at your disposal, as is our spa and fitness area with its green garden oasis.The restaurant is open for breakfast. Bar and lounge are at your disposal all day from 6 am to 11 pm - treat yourself to a perfect latte or a cool drink.iHotelier/iStay

name: B2 Hotel Zürich
description: Next to Zurich’s centre, B2 Hotel Zürich provides stylish, air-conditioned rooms in a former brewery. For an additional charge, guests can enjoy the public thermal bath and spa, comprising different swimming pools, a wellness area and a steam bath. Each room features a flat-screen satellite TV and a bathroom with a bathrobe, slippers and a shower or a tub. Free use of the minibar is included in the room rate. Free WiFi is available in all areas. The boutique hotel houses its own private library with 33,000 books. Swiss tapas, cheese and a wide range of different wines is served at the on-site lounge. Guests can enjoy a freshly prepared breakfast each morning. B2 Hotel Zürich comes with an elevator and a luggage storage room. The Zurich-Enge Train Station is just an 8-minute walk away and provides direct connections to the airport. The Hürlimannplatz Bus Stop (line 66) is 200 metres from the hotel, and the Enge/Bederstrasse Tram Stop (line 13) is a 7-minute walk away.

name: Mandarin Oriental Savoy, Zurich
description: Mandarin Oriental Savoy, Zurich features a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Zürich. This 5-star hotel offers a concierge service. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. Each room is equipped with air conditioning, and certain rooms at the hotel have a balcony. A buffet, à la carte or continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near Mandarin Oriental Savoy, Zurich include Fraumünster, Grossmünster and Paradeplatz. The nearest airport is Zurich Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: The Flag Zürich
description: Welcome to The Flag Zurich! The Flag Zurich offers a Hotel concept geared towards the needs of business people and city travellers. It's motto is "Home away from home", and it offers the convenience and amenities that modern-day nomads appreciate. Rooms in 4 categories can be booked for short stays or up to several months, with an attractive rate system for long-term guests.All 101 rooms are equipped with their own bathroom (shower/WC), a flatscreen TV, USB-Port, a Nespresso coffee maker, a water heater and a large fridge, some of them have a small balcony or a terrace.Complimentary WiFi throughout the building, including digital Newspapers and our E-Concierge which provides you with information about the Hotel and the City.All guests have access to our Fitness room as well as to the public terrace. Contemporary artworks and functional furniture create a unique atmosphere, modern and cosy at the same time.The delicous breakfast buffet and indoor/outdoor parking can be added optionally to your booking.For private Events and Business Meetings with up to 20 participants our "Lounge 600" including exclusive acces to the rooftoop terrace can be booked with attractive packages.iHotelier/iStay

name: H+ Hotel Zürich
description: The HPlus Zuerich is ideally located, directly opposite the Letzigrund Stadium and within easy reach by public transport. It offers every amenity in a modern setting. Continental breakfast available for a nominal fee. The 4-Star H Plus Hotel Zurich is ideally located, directly opposite the Letzigrung Stadium and only 15 minutes by tram from the Zurichs main railway station. The international atmosphere and modern architecture combine to make this newly built hotel a very special experience. The 159 comfortable and elegantly furnished rooms in the categories Comfort, Business and Junior Suites are all equipped with free Wi-Fi/WLAN, desk, flat screen TV, hair dryer and telephone. Sound proofed rooms with 1 bottle of mineral water. Nespresso Coffee machine in some rooms. The restaurant or the outdoor terrace is the perfect spot to enjoy regional and international specialties and delicacies. For a relaxing drink or to savor a cigar, why not head for the hotel bar or the smokers lounge. Guests also have access to the fitness room with sauna and exercise equipment to train, relax and unwind. The covered car parking has spaces for 69 cars, available for a nominal fee.Wyndham

name: Radisson Hotel & Suites Zurich
description: Located in Opfikon, 1.7 km from Zurich Exhibition Hall, Radisson Hotel & Suites Zurich provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. The property is set 6.3 km from Swiss National Museum, 6.5 km from Main Railway Station Zurich and 6.6 km from ETH Zurich. The accommodation offers free WiFi throughout the property, as well as a terrace and a restaurant. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Bahnhofstrasse is 7.7 km from Radisson Hotel & Suites Zurich, while Kunsthaus Zurich is 7.7 km away. The nearest airport is Zurich Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: Luxury Residences by Widder Hotel
description: No description found

name: Amazing Rooms By Five
description: Situated in Zürich, 3.2 km from Bahnhofstrasse, Amazing Rooms by FIVE features accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Featuring a garden, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property has a seasonal outdoor pool, indoor pool, fitness centre and free bikes. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. At the hotel rooms include bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options. Amazing Rooms by FIVE offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and hot tub. Speaking German, English, French and Italian, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Paradeplatz is 3.3 km from the accommodation, while Museum Rietberg is 3.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Zurich, 13 km from Amazing Rooms by FIVE, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Glärnischhof By Trinity
description: The Glärnischhof by TRINITY is located in the very centre of Zurich, right next to famous Bahnhofstrasse, the congress hall, the Tonhalle concert hall and Lake Zurich. It offers free WiFi and 60% discount for access to the Luxor Fitness Centre with sauna and steam bath, located only one minute walking distance from the hotel. The air-conditioned rooms feature a TV with international channels, a Beanarella coffee machine, and a bathroom. The ergonomic beds are equipped with special air cushioning. A continental breakfast is served every morning. The hotel restaurant, Trinity, serves schnitzel variations based on the Viennese model that are big, thin, tender and crispy. Cordon Bleus variations of Swiss origin and a large number of burger creations are also served. An airport shuttle service is available for a surcharge.

name: The Dufour by Hotel Schweizerhof Zürich
description: Featuring a restaurant, a fitness centre as well as a bar, The Dufour, Suites & Rooms is set in the City Centre of Zürich, 400 metres from Swiss National Museum. This 5-star hotel offers a concierge service and valet parking. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel all rooms come with a wardrobe and a private bathroom. The Dufour, Suites & Rooms offers a champagne breakfast buffet. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Zürich, like hiking. The property has a hairdresser's and business centre. Popular points of interest near The Dufour, Suites & Rooms include Lindenhof, ETH Zurich and Kunsthaus Zurich. The nearest airport is Zurich Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Intercityhotel Zürich Airport
description: Set in Rümlang, 7 km from Zurich Exhibition Hall, IntercityHotel Zürich Airport offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Offering a bar, the property is located within 12 km of ETH Zurich. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a tour desk and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At IntercityHotel Zürich Airport every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or an American breakfast. IntercityHotel Zürich Airport offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna. Swiss National Museum is 13 km from the hotel, while Main Railway Station Zurich is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Zurich Airport, 1 km from IntercityHotel Zürich Airport.

name: Sorell Hotel St. Peter
description: Sorell Hotel St. Peter has free bikes, fitness centre, a garden and shared lounge in Zürich. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms are fitted with a coffee machine, while some rooms also boast a kitchenette with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. At Sorell Hotel St. Peter every room has bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Sorell Hotel St. Peter offers a terrace. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Zürich, like hiking and cycling. Popular points of interest near Sorell Hotel St. Peter include Bahnhofstrasse, Paradeplatz and Fraumünster. The nearest airport is Zurich Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Ameron Zürich Bellerive Au Lac
description: Located in Zürich and with Zurich Opera House reachable within 400 metres, AMERON Zürich Bellerive au Lac provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room has a kettle, while selected rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also offer lake views. At AMERON Zürich Bellerive au Lac each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers American, vegetarian or vegan options. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Zürich, like cycling. A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at AMERON Zürich Bellerive au Lac. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Bellevueplatz, Grossmünster and Fraumünster. The nearest airport is Zurich Airport, 12 km from AMERON Zürich Bellerive au Lac.
